tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Artists (
  artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  birth_date DATE,
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  portfolio_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE sculptures (
    sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(255),
    artist_id INT,
    creation_date DATE,
    material VARCHAR(100),
    CONSTRAINT fk_artist
        FOREIGN KEY (artist_id)
        REFERENCES artists(artist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sculptural_works (
  work_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  work_name VARCHAR(255),
  artist_id INT,
  creation_date DATE,
  material_used VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE artist_portfolio (
  entry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_id INT,
  work_id INT,
  year_created INT,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Sculptures (
    sculpture_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sculpture_name VARCHAR(50),
    artist_id INT,
    creation_date DATE,
    material VARCHAR(50),
    PRIMARY KEY (sculpture_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES Artists(artist_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SculptureStylesMapping (
    sculpture_id INT,
    style_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (sculpture_id, style_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (sculpture_id) REFERENCES Sculptures(sculpture_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (style_id) REFERENCES SculptureStyles(style_id)
);
